name: Leg Press on Hackenschmidt Machine
how_to_perform:
1. Sit at the hackenschildt leg press machine with your back against the pad and your knees bent at a 90 degree angle.

2. Place your feet shoulder-width apart on the platform of the machine.

3. Push one leg away from you to engage the quadriceps muscle, keeping it straight for a count of 1-2 seconds.

4. Slowly lower the platform back down until your knee reaches 270 degrees of flexion.

5. Repeat with the other leg.

6. Continue alternating legs in this manner for the specified number of repetitions.
short_summary: Leg Press on Hackenschmidt Machine is an exercise that targets multiple muscle groups in the lower body and core, using the platform to perform the movement.
